did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY

persname.normal: [give the MARC presentation of creator here, i.e., surname first; include dates]

did.physdesc: Class notes, correspondence, meeting minutes, slides, photographs.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: The bulk of this collection is correspondence, meeting minutes, slides, and photographs relating to the construction of the Veterinary Medical Center and the Veterinary Education Center at the Cornell University College of Veterinary Medicine, 1987-1992. There are also class notes taken by Dr. Calnek while he was a DVM student at Cornell. In addition there is information about the S.B. Hitchner Student Scholarship, the Poultry Advisory Council, and the Rudolph J. Steffen Professorship.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Bruce. W. Calnek is an emeritus professor of avian medicine at the Cornell University College of Veterinary Medicine. He received his DVM from Cornell in 1955, joined the faculty at the College in 1961, and was named chair of the Department of Avian and Aquatic Animal Medicine in 1977. He retained that position until his retirement in 1995. Among his many contributions to the College and the University is his chairmanship of the Central Planning Committee that oversaw planning for the construction of the Veterinary Medical Center and the Veterinary Education Center.
For more information about Dr. Calnek, please consult his oral history interview in the Cornell University College of Veterinary Medicine Oral History Collection, RMC # 24-04-3349.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: The bulk of this collection is material relating to the construction of the Veterinary Medical Center and the Veterinary Education Center at the Cornell University College of Veterinary Medicine, 1987-1992. There are also class notes taken by Dr. Calnek while he was a DVM student at Cornell. In addition there is information about the S.B. Hitchner Student Scholarship, the Poultry Advisory Council, and the Rudolph J. Steffen Professorship.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Bruce W. Calnek papers, #24-02-3346. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

acqinfo.head: PROVENANCE
acqinfo.p: Donated by Dr. Bruce W. Calnek in 2004.

relatedmaterial.head: RELATED MATERIAL
relatedmaterial.p: Cornell University College of Veterinary Medicine Oral History Collection, RMC # 24-04-3349.
